name: Banality (Mini Jam 87)
description:
Welcome to the office. What a terrible place. So many terrible conversations about ugly babies, meaningless busy-work, and the weather. How banal...

Well, it's not done, but what is here is a pretty view of what the game could be! An arcade style dialog based RPG about all the stupid conversations we have in the office.

It's only my second game ever built, but I'm glad I tried. I learned a lot, and hope to keep on working on it and making it better. A HUGE thanks to rbatistadelima for their awesome Anime RPG Tilepack from which I borrowed heavily. And thanks to Void for 1980 the font.
